description: Returns hook-related information for the change set and a list of changes that CloudFormation makes when you run the change set.

parameters.name: ChangeSetName
parameters.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the change set that you want to describe.

nested_items.name: ChangeSetId
nested_items.description: The change set identifier (stack ID).

nested_items.name: ChangeSetName
nested_items.description: The change set name.

nested_items.name: Hooks
nested_items.description: List of hook objects.

nested_items.name: InvocationPoint
nested_items.description: Specifies the points in provisioning logic where a hook is invoked.

nested_items.name: FailureMode
nested_items.description: Specify the hook failure mode for non-compliant resources in the followings ways.
FAIL Stops provisioning resources.
WARN Allows provisioning to continue with a warning message.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The unique name for your hook. Specifies a three-part namespace for your hook, with a recommended pattern of Organization::Service::Hook.

nested_items.name: TypeVersionId
nested_items.description: The version ID of the type specified.

nested_items.name: TypeConfigurationVersionId
nested_items.description: The version ID of the type configuration.

nested_items.name: TargetDetails
nested_items.description: Specifies details about the target that the hook will run against.

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: The name of the type.

nested_items.name: ResourceTargetDetails
nested_items.description: Required if TargetType is RESOURCE.

nested_items.name: LogicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The resource's logical ID, which is defined in the stack's template.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of CloudFormation resource, such as AWS::S3::Bucket.

nested_items.name: ResourceAction
nested_items.description: Specifies the action of the resource.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Provides the status of the change set hook.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token, null or empty if no more results.

nested_items.name: StackId
nested_items.description: The stack identifier (stack ID).

nested_items.name: StackName
nested_items.description: The stack name.
